SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY REPORT

Account ID: ACC_0002

PART 1: TRANSACTION DETAILS

On 2025-12-21, a debit of EUR 1,418.28 was executed via card. The counterparty was a debtor (id: CP_40180).
On 2025-12-25, a debit of USD 3,663.45 was executed via wire. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_97915). Alert reason: high_risk_country
On 2025-12-28, a debit of USD 6,879.08 was executed via cash. The counterparty was a creditor (id: CP_83337).

PART 2: ACCOUNT SUMMARY
During the reporting period, total debits amounted to 13,073.91 and total credits amounted to 30,125.70. There were 4 debit transactions and 6 credit transactions. Unique creditors: 2; unique debtors: 0. Transactions observed: ACH, card, cash, crypto, wire.
